cardtext: A piano player for most of my life, now a certified full stack web developer. This venture in creativity is taking me to new heights & teaching me to always expand my limits.
It is my dream to build apps for companies & am currently taking on freelance projects. If code has taught me one thing, it is to be relentless in the search for the solution.
Relationships are so important! This is my beautiful wife, and daughters; they are the reason I chose this new career path of adventurous web development.
